divs: sighting detailsi took a video of it and posted to you tube. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=cymse4vl0hi i have night vision and normal night footage. it took off so fast it was not even recorded on the video. it looked almost exactly like the mcminnville ufo - it had a top spear with a red light on it not blinkking....and when it tried to take off it flashed some - but not like a plane....irregular see video
